title: Settings
description: Manage your account settings and preferences

profile.title: Profile
profile.personalInfoDesc: Edit your name, username, and profile photo in My Profile
profile.usernameMinLength: Username must be at least 3 characters
profile.usernameMaxLength: Username must be 30 characters or less

avatar.title: Your Avatar
avatar.description: Choose an avatar to represent you on leaderboards and throughout the platform

allergies.title: Allergies
allergies.description: Food or environmental allergies your coach should know about
allergies.coachNotice: Your coach will see this information

medical.title: Medical Conditions
medical.description: Any medical conditions that may affect your training
medical.notice: Share any conditions that may affect your training

leaderboard.title: Leaderboard Settings
leaderboard.description: Control how you appear on public leaderboards

preferences.title: Preferences
preferences.currencyDescription: Choose your preferred currency for display
preferences.currencyHint: This affects how prices are displayed for you and your clients throughout the platform.
preferences.locationDescription: Affects pricing currency and regional availability
preferences.cancellationPolicyDesc: Minimum hours notice required for clients to cancel without forfeiting package tokens.

animations.title: Celebration Animations
animations.description: Configure celebration effects for achievements and milestones
animations.enableCelebrationsDesc: Show visual celebrations when you achieve milestones
animations.enableConfettiDesc: Show confetti burst animations for achievements
animations.reducedMotionNotice: Your system prefers reduced motion. Animations are automatically disabled for accessibility.
animations.accessibilityNote: Animations respect your system accessibility settings automatically.

email.title: Email Notifications
email.description: Choose which notifications you'd like to receive via email
email.bookingsDesc: Receive emails for new bookings and confirmations
email.messagesDesc: Receive emails when you get new messages
email.remindersDesc: Receive email reminders before your sessions
email.marketingDesc: Receive tips, updates, and promotional content

push.title: Push Notifications
push.descriptionNative: Choose which push notifications to receive on your device
push.descriptionWeb: Choose which notifications appear in the notification center
push.bookingsDesc: Notifications for booking requests and updates

additional.title: Additional Notifications
additional.description: Configure notifications for challenges, achievements, and more
additional.challengesDesc: New challenges, expiring challenges, and completions

timing.title: Reminder Timing
timing.description: Choose when to receive session reminders
timing.howEarly: How early would you like to be reminded?

integrations.title: Integrations

video.title: Video Conferencing
video.description: Automatically create video meeting links for your online sessions

calendar.title: Calendar Sync
calendar.description: Automatically add coaching sessions to your calendar

dataPrivacy.title: Data & Privacy
dataPrivacy.description: When you connect integrations, your data is handled according to our privacy practices. Learn more about how we protect your data.

integrations.connectWearableHint: Connect a wearable to track your health metrics
integrations.manualHealthDesc: Log steps, heart rate, sleep manually

privacy.title: Health Data Privacy
privacy.description: Control which coaches can see your health data from connected wearables
privacy.noCoaches: You don't have any active coach connections yet.
privacy.noCoachesHint: Once you connect with a coach, you'll be able to manage their access to your health data here.

manualHealthModal.title: Log Health Data
manualHealthModal.description: Manually enter your health metrics. This data will sync with your coach's dashboard.
manualHealthModal.enterAtLeastOne: Please enter at least one value

verification.title: Coach Verification
verification.description: Upload documents to verify your credentials

identity.label: Government ID
identity.description: Passport, driver's license, or national ID

certification.label: Professional Certification
certification.description: Personal training, nutrition, or coaching certification

security.title: Security
security.checkBothEmails: Please check both your old and new email addresses to confirm the change.
security.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
security.twoFactorDescription: Add an extra layer of security to your account

account.title: Account
account.signOutDescription: Sign out of your account on this device
account.dangerZoneDesc: Irreversible actions that affect your account
account.deleteAccountDescription: Permanently delete your account and all associated data
account.deleteAccountWarning: This action cannot be undone. All your data will be permanently deleted.

subscription.title: Subscription
subscription.platformDescription: Choose a plan to unlock more features and grow your coaching business

stripeConnect.title: Connect Stripe
stripeConnect.description: Connect your Stripe account to receive payments from clients
stripeConnect.canReceivePayments: You can receive payments from clients
stripeConnect.verifyingDesc: Stripe is verifying your account. This may take a few moments.
stripeConnect.automaticTransfers: Automatic transfers to your bank account
stripeConnect.upgradePlan: Upgrade your plan to reduce fees

groupClasses.title: Group Classes
groupClasses.description: Offer group sessions and manage waitlists
groupClasses.createClassDesc: Set up a new group class for clients to join
groupClasses.deleteClassDesc: This will permanently delete this group class and remove all waitlist entries. This action cannot be undone.
groupClasses.createFirstClass: Create your first class to start accepting waitlist signups
groupClasses.noOneOnWaitlist: No one on the waitlist yet

form.waitlistOpenDesc: Allow clients to join the waitlist
form.activeDesc: Show this class on your profile

invoice.title: Invoice Settings
invoice.description: Configure your invoice details and branding
invoice.bankDetailsPlaceholder: Account name, sort code, account number...
invoice.previewDesc: See how your invoices will look

visibility.title: Marketplace Visibility
visibility.visibleDesc: Your profile appears in marketplace search results
visibility.hiddenDesc: Your profile is hidden from marketplace search

marketplace.visualIdentityDesc: Photos that represent you and your work
marketplace.cardPhotoDesc: This landscape image appears on your card in search results and listings
marketplace.galleryImagesDesc: Showcase your work, gym, or training sessions (up to 5 images)
marketplace.aboutYouDesc: Tell clients about your expertise and background
marketplace.bioDesc: Your professional story and coaching philosophy
marketplace.bioPlaceholder: Tell clients about your background, what motivates you, and your coaching approach...
marketplace.whoIWorkWithDesc: Describe your ideal clients and who you specialise in helping
marketplace.whoIWorkWithPlaceholder: e.g., Beginners looking to build confidence, busy professionals wanting flexible training, athletes preparing for competitions...
marketplace.locationAvailabilityDesc: Where and how clients can train with you
marketplace.gymHint: Leave blank if you're an online-only coach
marketplace.groupClassesDesc: Manage your group training sessions and waitlists
marketplace.socialLinksDesc: Connect your social profiles so clients can learn more about you
marketplace.cardImageHint: Upload a landscape photo optimized for your marketplace listing. This is separate from your profile picture.
marketplace.galleryShowcase: Showcase your work with up to 5 photos
marketplace.galleryEmptyTitle: Click to upload your first gallery image
marketplace.galleryEmptyDesc: Show clients who you work with and your training style
marketplace.galleryMaxReached: Maximum 5 gallery images reached. Remove one to add more.
marketplace.galleryRecommended: Recommended: 1200Ã—800px minimum, 4:3 aspect ratio. Max 5MB per image. JPG or PNG format.
marketplace.specialtiesCustomHint: Can't find your specialty? Add a custom one that best describes your expertise.

visibility.title: Marketplace Visibility
visibility.visibleDesc: Your profile appears in marketplace search results
visibility.hiddenDesc: Your profile is hidden from marketplace search

services.title: Services & Pricing
services.pricingCurrencyDesc: Select the currency for your rates. This will be displayed to clients.

general.title: General Settings
general.maintenanceModeDesc: Put the platform in maintenance mode (users can't access)
general.requireVerificationDesc: Coaches must verify their credentials before accepting clients
general.anonymousReviewsDesc: Allow users to leave reviews without showing their name

branding.title: Branding & Social
branding.description: Platform branding and social media links

features.title: Feature Configuration
features.overridesDesc: Grant individual coaches access to specific features

validation.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
validation.invalidPhone: Please enter a valid phone number
validation.maxLength: Must be no more than {{max}} characters

reviewRequests.title: Review Requests
reviewRequests.description: Control when and how review requests are sent to clients after sessions

mode.label: When to send review requests
mode.autoDesc: Send review requests automatically when you mark a session as complete
mode.manualDesc: Only send review requests when you click the 'Request Review' button

delay.label: Send review request
delay.hint: Choose when the review request email is sent after session completion

customMessage.label: Personal message (optional)
customMessage.placeholder: Add a personal touch to your review requests...
customMessage.hint: This message will be included in the review request email
